name: Cartographer
description: Visual code-to-flowchart tool with step-by-step execution for debugging and understanding control flow
longDescription:
Cartographer transforms your JavaScript code into interactive flowcharts. It provides:

- **Real-time visualization**: Watch your code structure as a control flow graph
- **Step-by-step execution**: Debug by stepping through your code visually
- **Variable watch**: Track variable values during execution
- **Bi-directional editing**: Edit code from the flowchart or vice versa
- **Speed controls**: Adjust execution speed and enable looping for continuous visualization

Perfect for 'vibe coders' who prefer visual learning and debugging. See your code flow, understand complex logic, and catch bugs faster with visual feedback.
